title: Flex Team LFM Gold 1 or lower in solo/duo
body:
Hey all,

Looking for a top main and a jungle main for our flex team. The idea is to play 5v5 flex and join tournaments for fun and to be a bit competitive. Not looking for toxic people but people who will learn and have some fun with a bit of banter. 

Requirements:
 - Must be available at peak times regularly (not everyday but not just weekends) 
 - Be gold 1 or lower in Solo/Duo
 - Not be toxic to team or others
 - must be willing to communicate via discord (please no laptop mics with your family in the background) 

Please add me 'Typhoid Mary' to get in touch.
